name: Fresh Gourmet Premium Croutons | Italian Seasoned | 3 Ounce, Pack of 15 | Crunchy Salad Topper
short_description: PREMIUM ITALIAN CROUTONS: Premium restaurant style gourmet croutons with zesty Italian seasoning; 3-oz. (Pack of 15)

CREATING THE PERFECT CROUTON: We start with fresh, oven-baked bread, toasted to a golden brown; generous-sized croutons seasoned with a savory blend of herbs and spices make the perfect finishing touch
SPRINKLE, CRUNCH, REPEAT: Our premium salad croutons add crunch to your favorite soups, salads and more; Only 25-30 calories per serving
CONVENIENT RESEALABLE BAG: Handy resealable bag helps keep your salad toppings fresh; For maximum freshness, refrigerate after opening
ALLERGENS: Contains milk and wheat; Packaged in a facility that also packages tree nuts
product_description: Premium restaurant-style croutons, generously seasoned and made from fresh, oven baked bread, toasted to a golden brown. Taste the difference when you toss your salad with Fresh Gourmet Italian seasoned premium croutons. No need to go to Tuscany, Venice or Rome – these great tasting, premium croutons are as close as your local produce department. One bite is all it takes to find out why our croutons are the toss of the town! At Fresh Gourmet, we bring good taste to your table – every day. Fresh Gourmet is the number one brand of croutons and salad toppings sold in the world. Long known for the innovative approach that inspired the original produce crouton, the Fresh Gourmet brand offers the largest variety of salad toppings available on the market today. As salad toppings experts, Fresh Gourmet sets the pace with today`s trends, offering busy cooks the crunch, flavor and texture that transform everyday dishes into memorable meals in minutes. For nearly 30 years, Fresh Gourmet continues to be the one brand you turn to for the crunch you crave!

name: Aleia’s Gluten Free Seasoned Croutons – 5.5oz (2 Pack) – Crunchy Topping for Salads & Soups – Dairy Free, Soy Free, Low Sodium, No MSG, Kosher
short_description: GLUTEN-FREE. FLAVOR-FULL.: Aleia's is a women-owned, grassroots company established in 2008, A USA-based manufacturer that produces premium quality, clean label better-for-you, certified gluten-free foods that taste not only as good as their gluten-filled counterparts, but better. We believe you will find our products to be like nothing else out there and the Best. Taste. Ever.

FRESH SIMPLE INGREDIENTS, BATCH AFTER BATCH.: At Aleia’s, what you eat means the world to us. Taste is our main ingredient. For over fifteen years we’ve continued to craft food using only the finest ingredients. We use grains such as brown rice, tapioca, and potato flour. Unmatched in flavor and texture! Among Aleia's products are multi-use breadcrumbs, panko, coatings, stuffings, and croutons. Pantry essentials!

PANTRY ESSENTIALS: Aleia’s makes gluten-free substitutes for stocking your pantry with the foods you need to whip up a meal that wow’s everyone, tastes amazing- and just happens to be gluten-free! It’s a single cooking solution for families and friends to enjoy regardless of who is coming to the dinner table!

ALL THE GOODNESS: 2 PACK - contains 2 /5.5 oz. Aleia’s Gluten-Free Seasoned Croutons. Made in a facility that is 100% GLUTEN-Free, DAIRY-Free, TREE NUT-Free, PEANUT-Free, SOY-Free, CORN-free, SESAME-free, SHELLFISH-free.

100% HAPPY GUARANTEE: Aleia’s is dedicated to customer satisfaction. If you experience a problem with any of our products, customer service, or shipping — please contact us. We'll strive to do whatever it takes to make it right for you. We are grateful for your support of Aleia's Gluten Free Foods and appreciate the opportunity to share our products with you. The highest compliment you can pay us is to be completely satisfied with your experience.

name: Gefen Onion Garlic Mini Croutons, 12 oz | Mini Croutons for Salad, Soup and Snacking | Dairy Free Seasoned Croutons | Vegan
short_description: ONION GARLIC CROUTONS - A savory blend of zesty onion and bold garlic, these croutons are perfect for salads, soups, casseroles, or as a crunchy snack on their own.
READY TO USE – Gefen mini croutons are pre-seasoned and ready to eat straight from the zip top bag, these croutons save time in the kitchen, making meal prep quick and easy.
CONVENIENT - Their mini size and fun flavor options make them an ideal choice for party platters, charcuterie boards, or a simple, crowd-pleasing topping.
PREMIUM INGREDIENTS – These seasoned croutons are vegan, non GMO and made with high-quality ingredients offering a delightful crunch wherever you add them.
CERTIFIED – Gefen Onion Garlic Mini Croutons are certified Kosher.

name: Kooshy Croutons - Mambo Italiano (Sourdough Bread, Garlic, Basil, Parmesan), All Natural, Vegetarian, Non-GMO Croutons for Salad, Soup and More, 5oz Pouch(1 Pack)
short_description: MAMBO ITALIANO - Il classico. How can you beat garlic, basil and parmesan? Hint: you can’t. Buon appetito. Mangia! Ok that's all the Italian we know. These salad toppers are also perfect for soup, snacking and more. All Natural. Non-GMO. Vegan.

REAL BREAD MAKES REAL CROUTONS - We use the highest quality ingredients like organic flour and extra virgin olive oil, to make a delicious loaf of real artisan sourdough bread. It then gets cut, seasoned and baked again for the perfect texture. Not too crunchy, not too light - just right!

QUALITY MATTERS - We’re All Natural, Non-GMO Project Verified and we never use artificial flavors, preservatives or dyes. 3 of our 4 flavors are also Vegan Friendly unlike most croutons. Say goodbye to boring, enriched white flour croutons with long ingredient lines.

OUR STORY - We're two brothers obsessed with bread. While other kids screamed for ice cream, we begged for a beautiful, crusty sourdough loaf (thanks @mom). Now we bring that same excitement to every bag of Kooshy Croutons!

4 DELICIOUS FLAVORS TO SAVOR - Upgrade your Caesar salad with Almost Naked or Mambo Italiano. Try Poco Picante in taco salad. Use French Toast like candied pecans. Packed in resealable bags, our salad toppings have the perfect flavor and crunchy texture. Also don’t be afraid to admit…croutons are a snack! Eat a bag straight, no chaser. We don’t judge.

product_description: Add the perfect crunch to your salads and soups with Seasoned Croutons. These generously sized croutons are expertly seasoned and toasted to golden-brown perfection, offering a satisfying crunch in every bite. The large 32-ounce package ensures you'll have plenty for multiple meals, whether you're tossing them in a classic Caesar salad, garnishing a warm bowl of tomato soup, or using them as a crispy topping for casseroles. These versatile croutons maintain their delightful texture and savory flavor, making them an essential pantry staple for quick meal enhancement. The resealable package helps maintain freshness, letting you enjoy consistently crunchy croutons whenever you need them. Perfect for family meals, entertaining guests, or adding that finishing touch to your favorite dishes.

name: Chatham Village Large Cut Garlic & Butter Croutons, 5-Ounce Bags (Pack of 12)
short_description: Twice Baked
All Natural
Traditional Cut
product_description: The tradition started years ago in a small sandwich shop in Chatham, Massachusetts, located at the elbow of Cape Cod. The baker's goal was to make the freshest, best tasting croutons in the world, using all-natural ingredients. Chatham Village Croutons are unique because they are 'baked-twice'. They're made from freshly baked French bread which is cut into tasty morsels. Then the croutons are seasoned with a special blend and baked gently to create a delightful combination of flavor and crunch.
